import "./Home.css" function NavBar() { // const hamburger = document.querySelector(".hamburger"); // const navMenu = document.querySelector(".nav-menu"); let clsNav = "nav-menu" let clsHam = "hamburguer" function mobileMenu() { clsNav += " active" clsHam += " active" } const navLink = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link"); navLink.forEach(n => n.addEventListener("click", closeMenu)); function closeMenu() { clsNav = "nav-menu" clsHam = "hamburguer" } return (

mobileMenu} className={clsHam}>
); } export default NavBar
